net.sourceforge.waters.model.compiler.efa

Class EFAEventNameBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sourceforge.waters.model.compiler.efa.EFAEventNameBuilder

  • public class EFAEventNameBuilder
extends Object
    A simple algorithm to determine reasonably short name suffixes for EFA events. EFA event names are suffixed by a string representing the guard conditions for each event. This class transforms guards representing guard conditions into canonical names, by sorting the constraints, and by removing constraints that are not needed to distinguish an event name suffix from others.
    Author:
    Robi Malik
